name: Voja the Biceps
description:
This game is about a lonely cowboy Voja the Biceps who is searching for his faith in the wild wild west.

The game is created during the first Game Jam in Startit centar Zrenjanin by the ProNoobs crew. 

 

Starring Vojislav Sekulic as Voja the Biceps 

ProNoobs crew:

Mihajlo Radmilovic - Programmer

Ivan Stajic - Designer 

Aleksandar Stefanov - Team Coordinator 

Nikita Dujin - Sound Design and Music

Marko Pomorisac - Game designer
